ver.Change: - Initial Release

- USB Connect issue fix
 - Added in apps from CM such as Apollo, cLock, etc
 - Removed AOKP stats
 - Battery improvement and performance tweaks
 - Moved around tabs in Settings
 - Cherry picked about a dozen features to include the following
 
 ** Lockscreen targets
 ** Option to hide statusbar
 ** Option to change lockscreen wallpaper
 ** Got rid of unnecessary toggles such as NFC and LTE
 ** Got rid of the 'protekk' string in statusbar clock
 ** Hardware keys (ability to remap them)
 ** Option to use BLN (button light notifications)
 ** Launcher tab in settings
 ** CM advanced phone settings (vibrate on answer, vibrate on hangup, etc)
 ** Ascending ringtone in settings/sound
 
 - Changed bootanimation (Thanks iBlowpot)
 - Added Team D.I.R.T to 'Show Your Support' tab in RC
 - Enable toggles/widgets w/o having to flash GAPPS
 - Updated hosts file for ad-free experience

- Removed Nova Launcher
 - Added Roman Nurik's Dash Clock
 - Added ability to toggle CRT screen on/off
 - Added AOKP's new/old toggles
 - Added CM style battery
 - Added Dotted circle battery
 - Added ability to change the color of CM batteries
 - Added ability to change lockscreen wallpaper
 - Added again lockscreen targets (WIP)
 - Added HDR commits (camera)
 - Added in again CM advanced phone settings
 - Removed AOKP stats, again
 - Added Add launcher configuration in settings
 - Gave birth to Dirt Settings (WIP)
 - Added to Dirt Settings hardware keys
 - Added to Dirt Settings cLock widget settings
 - Added support for Koush's Superuser
 - Remove chipset tag in hardware info
 - Fixed roaming indicator issue
 - Added Support tab in settings
 - Added two themes built from source

- Removed Trebuchet launcher
 - Removed Launcher2
 - Removed extra languages in system apps
 - Removed Hardware keys in Dirt Settings
 - Added Facebook sync hack
 - Added HoloLauncherHD
 - Added Koush's superuser
 - Added Evervolv's widgets
 - Added Dirty Unicorns logo to About section
 - Added (forget all WiFi networks) MOD
 - Added CM powerwidgets (Dirt Settings)
 - Added Moto style Navbar buttons
 - Added halo-ized icons
 - Added Axiom Battery
 - Added Transparent Lockscreen MOD
 - Added CRT animations
 - Added Navigation Ring (WIP)
 - Added HBOOT assert
 - Improved AOSP Download/Upload animation
 - A few string changes
 - Updated cLock and DashClock
 - Changed default kernel (buttered toast)
 - Intergrated Support tab into Dirt Settings
 - Fixed WiFi Tethering
 - Fixed APN issue
 - Fixed USB disconnect issue
 - Fixed hardware back to kill feature
 - Fixed SystemUI FC present in v1.2 caused by volume control

- Fixed USB tethering
 - Fixed Camcorder not recording
 - Fixed bluetooth issue
 - Fixed DSPManager not working
 - Added Paranoidandroid Lockscreen shortcuts
 - Added PIE
 - Added notification icon opacity
 - Fixed several typos throughout the ROM
 - Reverted back to Evervolv kernel

- Fixed Wimax
 - Removed Performance Control
 - Added CM's performance under Dirt Settings
 - Added Xposed Settings
 - Added ability to hide Volume State toggles in Power Menu
 - Enabled Wimax Toggle for EVWidgets and CM Power Widgets 
 - Added option to daydream on wireless charger
 - Set default Navbar Alpha To full opacity
 - Added option to hide Camera widget from lockscreen
 - Added option to disable fullscreen keyboard
 - Made changes to updater-script
 - OCD kicked in and made more string changes
 - Removed SwagPapers, UnicornPorn, etc.
 - Added in Dirt Papers

- Allow theming of lockscreen
 - PIE updates
 - Fix Tablet layout
 - Added CM skinny Battery
 - Added Screenshot Toggle
 - Added Screenshot delay option in RC
 - Added CM's built-in Changelog
 - Resized icons (HDPI and XHDPI)
 - Removed Nav Ring in RC

- CM Profiles added in
 - LCD Density Control in Dirt Settings
 - Added a 'Share' preference in About DU
 - Optimized ALL OGG audio files
 - Fixed ringtones not showing up
 - Added Notification Shortcuts
 - Adjusted Notification carrier label
 - Added scrollable AOKP toggles
 - Added more AOKP devs to 'About AOKP'
 - Removed modified ad-free hosts file
 - Removed Screenshot toggle

- Have DashClock hide lockscreen clock
 - Increased PIE speed
 - Don't clear wallpaper when SystemUI restarts
 - Fix opacity of LastApp Icon 
 - Enable Ad-Hoc (IBSS) network configuration
 - Added Screenshot toggle back in
 - Rearranged OOM values
 - Small Profile fixes
 - Restart SystemUI to change Signal/WiFi when selected
 - Build in WiMAX log cleaner
 - Allow voicemail notifications to be dismissed
 - Show more apps (15) in battery statistics
 - Moved profiles up and removed toggle tab
 - Fixed cLock yahoo API issue
 - Added build.prop tweaks to Dirt Settings

- Added 15 more batteries
 - Merged latest from CM for Apollo
 - Merged latest from CM for CMFileManager
 - Merged latest from TUN_SD for JellyBlack theme
 - Set ringtone mode even if ringer is silent
 - Added Breathing SMS Notification
 - Fixed Visibility of Action Bar Text
 - Fixed audio routing issues with VOIP calls
 - Fixed increasing volume checkbox layout
 - Fixed scene mode breakage caused by soft-hdr feature

- Added Breathing missed call
 - Added SlimRoms' TRDS built in theme
 - Added Dark Dirty Toggle
 - Removed JellyBlack and SnapBlack

- Enable SoftBank emoji encoding 
 - Added hide/show avatar feature 
 - ForwardPort Direct Call Feature 
 - SMS/MMS Mark all as Read option 
 - Added font size to MMS threads 
 - Option to strip all unicode characters
 - Added Easy Selector 
 - Fixed Message Breathing check
 - Added Signature feature 
 - Added privacy mode notifications
 - CM Quick Reply feature / Dark theme
 - Removed CM Performance Settings
 - Reset SystemUI when enabling Dark and Dirty switch
 - Added Profiles tab / Fixed issue w/ bluetooth
 - Added AOKP's Performance Settings back to ROMControl
 - Moved Themes from Settings to ROMControl
 - Add Date to Status Bar clock
 - Added more TRDS resources
 - Fixed Cursor leak
 - Runtime enablement of WebGL
 - Enable Copy/Paste in Google Talk
 - Applied OpenPDroid patches for use of PDroidManager
 - Added Volume Toggle
 - Added CM SoundRecorder
 - Fixed Photosphere/Camera FCs

- Added Hardware keys remap mod
 - Status bar Auto-Hide
 - GB style recents option
 - Swipe to switch Quick Settings
 - Fixed TabetUI notification icon layout
 - Fixed a few memory leaks
 - Fixed recents minimization animation
 - Replaced system icons based off Sketchy Icons
 - Added more pngs for Dark and Dirty and resized a few
 - Optimized SystemUI images with pngcrush
 - Removed app drawer icons for Xposed Installer/Framework

- Disabled reset of SystemUI when enabling Dark and Dirty
 - Added quick emoji button next to text input
 - Reverted all OpenPDroid patches (see note #2)
 - Added media scanner mod in Settings/Developer options
 - Switched to Mike's latest AOSP kernel (prebuilt)
 - Restart SystemUI when enabling Auto Hide statusbar

- Added Hybrid Engine
 - Added Permissions management
 - Added StayAwake Toggle
 - Added .75x animation scale
 - Added update tab in About DU
 - Rearranged Settings tabs and changed icons
 - Removed LCD Density and Xposed stuff
 - Removed ModeUI out of ROMControl

- Added StayAwake, Expanded Desktop and WirelessADB toggles
 - Fixed annoying ringtone bug
 - List rejected calls separately
 - Added Speedometer battery
 - Added more Statusbar clock options
 - Added App Sidebar from ChaOS

- Fixed SystemUI FC's
 - Fixed PIE alignment issue
 - Fixed tablet UI battery issues
 - Fixed profiles power menu bug
 - Fixed issue with not being able to add APN's
 - Removed conflicting mods, will add once issues are fixed
 - Removed themed system icons
 - Added Google's new drawer UI to multiple system apps
 - Added AOKP Ribbons
 - Added power off on lockscreen mod
 - Added ChaOS Launcher (removed Holo Launcher HD)
 - Added new Theme Engine (BAMF)
 - Added back Navigation Ring
 - Added Lockscreen tint color mod
 - Added 8 lockscreen targets
 - Added Moar clock options
 - Added Jackpal Terminal / CM sound recorder
 - Updated Dark and Dirty

- Added Halo from Paranoidandroid
 - Added battery warning mod
 - Rebased Expanded desktop mod
 - Reverted to switches in power menu under RC
 - Added volume states and profiles switches in power menu
 - Merged updates for CM apps, Evervolv and ChaOS launcher
 - Removed CM based changelog and added new changelog app

- Added Solid Color Picker to DirtPapers
 - Added in PA Halo app to pin apps
 - Merged in latest updates to DashClock
 - Added Paranoidandroid's hybrid engine
 - Added Per-App-Color from PA as well
 - Some PIE updates
 - Removed all features conflicting with hybrid engine/PAC

- Added Halo toggle / Music Toggle
 - Added Net speed mod in statusbar
 - Added DU Stats
 - Added Improve Recents / ROM Control options
 - Added Team Baked tile color mod
 - Added More batteries
 - Added PAC support for all batteries
 - Added CM sound panel
 - Added SunBeam LWP
 - Added GPS indicator to camera / HDR video support
 - Added Gesture based lockscreen mod
 - Added CM privacy guard support
 - Added Toggle dots/error pattern mod
 - Removed redundant sound panel feature in RC
 - Fixed MMS issue with Dark and Dirty
 - Fixed halo button animations
 - Fixed Phablet issue on some XHDPI devices
 - Fixed up Ribbons icon
 - Switched to Gravatar for support avatars
 - Switch default font to Roboto Light
 - Halo color improvements
 - Show as floating window on recent apps

- Removed Dirt Papers / Added new wallpaper app
 - Added About app / Mapped to Dirt Settings
 - Removed redundant stuff related to About app
 - Added External GPS Support from CM
 - Show application's package name in the App info screen
 - Switched Color pickers (SlimROMs)
 - Set certain toggles/settings as default
 - Fixed Overflow bug / Moved to RC from Settings
 - Added Halo Size
 - Added Dirt Settings Tile/Toggle
 - Added PAC (per app color) to PIE
 - Removed PIE colors since is PAC supported now
 - Added Custom view for hybrid toggle
 - Added SMS Middleware layer
 - Updated SystemUI's proguard.flags
 - Added a delimiter between scheme and host
 - Merged Halo improvements from PA
 - Prompt users Mms can't receive msgs if storage is full
 - Allow contact via SMS on number longpress in conversation
 - Maded UI improvements to DSPManager
 - Maded UI improvements to Theme Chooser
 - Maded UI improvements to DU Stats
 - Merged CM updates for CM apps
 - Added Traffic indicator support for PAC, fixed MB/KB issue
 - Added Halo support for tablet UI
 - Added QuietHours Shortcuts
 - Added Hot Reboot option to power menu
